column1: Table 6 16: Cost estimate of minor irrigation related proposals with locations

column3: Problem to be addressed /Recommendations

The height of the anicut is insufficient. Irrigation canal is silted and covered with overgrowth due to poor maintenance. Recommend 1. to raise the anicut by casting a concrete capping of 300mm highx450mm wide x6m long. 2. To provide anicut planks of 1.4 Sq.m.

A part of the canal is not concrete lined. (L- 700m). Recommend 1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 300 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. Or
3. Cultivate edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface.

•Seepages towards the field side. (L- 200m). Recommend 
1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 200 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. Or
3. Cultivate edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface.

•A part of the canal is not concrete lined. (L- 1000m). Recommend 1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 400 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. Or
3. Cultivate edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface.

•Water seeping into the banks on both sides. (L- 800m) Recommend 
1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 400 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. 
3. plant areca nut seedlings rows in both embankments.

•Water seeping into the banks on both sides. (L- 800m) Recommend 
1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 400 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. 3. plant areca nut seedlings rows in both embankments.

2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. Or

The temporary earthen anicut bund is weak and unserviceable. Recommend to construct an inverted "T" shape, 2.5m long x 0.25 thick x 1.5m high with 0.9m base concrete anicut with 0.8sq.m anicut planks.

•Water seeping into the banks on both sides. (L- 600m). Recommend 
1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 500 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. 3. plant areca nut seedlings rows in both embankments.

•The canal is not concrete lined, and seepages occur from the bottom of the canal. (L- 1200m). Recommend 
1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 700 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. 
3. plant areca nut seedlings rows in both embankments.
Absence of an anicut gate. Recommend providing anicut planks of 0. 7sq.m

The driving head is insufficient. Perished anicut planks. Recommend raising the anicut height by a grade 25 concrete capping with dowels and provide planks. Capping size 0.3m (high) x0.45m (wide) x5m (long) and opening size 1.8m x0.9m

•Seepages from the canal towards the field side. (L- 900m) This leads to subsiding the banks. Recommend to 
1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 700 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. or3. Cultivate edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface.

•The reservation of Murapola canal is eroding at the field side. (3km). Recommend
1. Make dense strip planting of mixed vegetation comprising Areca nut trees /Kithul /Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/Kaduru/Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna/Riparian species/Local fruits randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval. 
2. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. 
3. Introduction of riparian plants within water holes. Covered area 5000 m2.

Canal overflows and the canal banks are landsliding. (1200m). Recommend to 
1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 800 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. Or
3. Cultivate edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface.

•Seepages towards the field side. (L- 300m). Recommend to 1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about300 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. Or
3. Cultivate edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface.

•Overflow and seepages towards the field side. (L- 200m) . Recommend to
1. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide and length about 200 m.
2. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows. or 
3. Cultivate edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface. 
4. Plant Areca nut seedlings in both sides at 1m spacing.

•Absence of an anicut. A part of the canal is not concrete lined, and seepages occur from the canal. (12 acres) (L- 1000m). Recommend
1. to construct inverted "T" shape profile for concrete wall (Length 6m x Height 1.2m x Thickness 0.3m) with foundation (Length 6m x Width 0.9m x Thickness 0.2m). 
2. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide for 600m length. 
3. Plant Areca nut seedlings in both sides at 1m spacing.
4. Protection by turfing sods with vetiver grass rows.

2. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide for 500m length.

2. Earth filling to narrow tracks to form channel bund of 1 - 1.5m wide for 300m length.
